pullRequest.title: Sb track2 remove Locktoken Interface  and use String for lockToken
pullRequest.bodyText:
Remove LockToken interface and use String instead.
Users are not able to find LockToken interface.

Update API
Update Test

commit.message: Increment package version after release of com.azure azure-messaging-servicebus
Removing locktoken interface and using String instead.

nodes.bodyText: You don't need to mock this anymore you can set the string and return it.
The check doesn't match the documentation. This throws a NPE rather than IllegalArgumentExceptionwhen lockToken is null.
The check doesn't match the documentation. This throws a NPE rather than IllegalArgumentExceptionwhen lockToken is null.
This isn't correct? It should be one or the other.
